__e: What he says is full of wisdom and good sense.
Once again, Red's simple, earthy wisdom saves the day.
I give you a gift of knowledge and you fuck it away!
May God grant us the wisdom to discover the right, and the strength to make it endure.
But before it kills me I'm going to tell it that I asked the God of Wisdom to come but he was afraid he'd get the answer wrong.
You want the wisdom to know the difference between... what you can and can't change?
The board, in its almighty wisdom, has decided to cut the changes that you made to the curriculum, pretty much anything that's not classical.
I do very much, but the Master, in his wisdom, has other plans.
"Whatsoever your hand finds to do... do it gladly... because there is no work, love, knowledge... or wisdom in the grave".
Not that it would do that emptyhead any harm a little -or a lot- more knowledge then we'll see how study really suits me!
But there's also wisdom in something I haven't heard.
To gain wisdom from the past, and in your case, acknowledge that the past existed.
But I thought your paper, the temple of culture and wisdom in this town, would like an exclusive on the visit of a world champion.
Father's wisdom isn't in this wine!
